channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- NetWorker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- NetWorker

item.title: CVE-2020-26182|2024-09-16T20:28:03.773Z -- dell -- networker
item.description: Dell EMC NetWorker versions prior to 19.3.0.2 contain an incorrect privilege assignment vulnerability. A non-LDAP remote user with low privileges may exploit this vulnerability to perform 'saveset' related operations in an unintended manner. The vulnerability is not exploitable by users authenticated via LDAP.

item.title: CVE-2020-26183|2024-09-16T17:38:59.166Z -- dell -- networker
item.description: Dell EMC NetWorker versions prior to 19.3.0.2 contain an improper authorization vulnerability. Certain remote users with low privileges may exploit this vulnerability to perform 'nsrmmdbd' operations in an unintended manner.

item.title: CVE-2021-21558|2024-09-16T21:08:13.066Z -- dell -- networker
item.description: Dell EMC NetWorker, 18.x, 19.1.x, 19.2.x 19.3.x, 19.4 and 19.4.0.1, contains an Information Disclosure vulnerability. A local administrator of the gstd system may potentially exploit this vulnerability to read LDAP credentials from local logs and use the stolen credentials to make changes to the network domain.

item.title: CVE-2021-21600|2024-09-16T21:56:28.126Z -- dell -- networker
item.description: Dell EMC NetWorker, 19.4 or older, contain an uncontrolled resource consumption flaw in its API service. An authorized API user could potentially exploit this vulnerability via the web and desktop user interfaces, leading to denial of service in the manageability path.
